home.platformDescription: The platform that connects students and companies for internships and work-study programs that truly match your expectations.
home.discoverOurServices: Discover all our services to facilitate your internship and work-study search
home.personalizedProfileDescription: Create your profile and highlight your skills and best opportunities.
home.targetedOffersDescription: Access offers that perfectly match your profile and aspirations.
home.smartMatchingDescription: Our algorithm suggests the best offers based on your profile and preferences.
home.directContactDescription: Exchange directly with companies and students without intermediaries.
home.joinCommunity: Join our community and find the internship or apprenticeship of your dreams

about.missionSubtitle: Facilitate the meeting between talented students and innovative companies to create tomorrow's opportunities.
about.missionDescription: Facilitate the meeting between talented students and innovative companies to create tomorrow's opportunities.
about.innovationDescription: We believe in innovation and constant adaptation to the needs of the job market.
about.communityDescription: We build a strong community between students and companies.
about.excellenceDescription: We aim for excellence in every aspect of our service.
about.transparencyDescription: We prioritize clear and honest communication with all our users.
about.historyParagraph1: Founded in 2021, Adopte un Étudiant was born from a simple vision: to create a bridge between the academic and professional worlds. Our platform facilitates connections between students and companies, allowing each to find the opportunity that suits them.
about.historyParagraph2: Today, we continue to innovate and develop our services to meet the evolving needs of the job market and new generations of students.

team.teamSubtitle: Discover the passionate people who work every day to connect students and companies.
team.sophieDescription: Graduated from ESSEC, Sophie founded 'Adopte un Étudiant' after observing the professional integration difficulties of young people.
team.thomasDescription: Web development expert, Thomas has created for several startups before joining our team.
team.aminaDescription: Amina develops partnerships with higher education institutions.
team.lucasDescription: Lucas' mission is to convince companies from all sectors to join the platform.
team.transparencyDescription: We believe in honest and clear communication with all our users and partners.
team.accessibilityDescription: We make internship opportunities accessible to all students, regardless of their training or background.
team.innovationDescription: We constantly seek to improve our platform to offer the best possible experience to all users.
team.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our actions and define our corporate culture.
team.joinTeamDescription: We are always looking for talented and passionate people to help us accomplish our mission.

missions.missionsSubtitle: Facilitate the professional integration of students and meet the needs of companies.
missions.personalizedSupportDescription: We guide each student in their professional journey with follow-up adapted to their needs and aspirations.
missions.matchingDescription: Our platform connects companies with talents that best match their needs.
missions.pedagogicalInnovationDescription: We develop innovative tools to facilitate learning and professional integration.
missions.continuousTrainingDescription: We offer resources and training to develop students' professional skills.
missions.ctaDescription: Whether you're a student looking for an internship or a company seeking talent, we're here to support you in your journey.

partners.partnersSubtitle: Discover the companies and institutions that trust us to connect talents and opportunities.
partners.companyPartnersDescription: These innovative companies partner with our platform to offer quality internship opportunities and contribute to the training of the new generation of professionals.
partners.schoolPartnersDescription: We collaborate with leading higher education institutions to facilitate students' access to enriching professional opportunities.
partners.becomePartnerSubtitle: Join our partner network and benefit from our services
partners.becomePartnerDescription: Join our partner network and participate in the training of the next generation of talents. Together, let's create opportunities that will shape students' professional future.
partners.visibilityDescription: Showcase your brand and opportunities to a targeted community of motivated and qualified students.
partners.recruitmentDescription: Find talents that exactly match your needs through our intelligent matching system.
partners.supportDescription: Benefit from personalized follow-up throughout the recruitment and intern integration process.

contact.heroDescription: We are here to help. Contact us for any questions or requests.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.responseTime: Our team usually responds within 24 business hours. For any emergency, please don't hesitate to contact us by phone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: Adopte un Étudiant is committed to protecting the privacy of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our platform.
privacy.dataUsageText: We use your personal data to:
dataUsageList: Create and manage your user account
Facilitate connections between students and companies
Improve our services and your user experience
privacy.dataSharingText: We never sell your personal data. We may share certain information with partner companies only in the context of the application process, and always with your explicit consent.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.
privacy.yourRightsText: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
yourRightsList: Right of access to your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Right to erasure of your data
privacy.contactText: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the Adopte un Étudiant platform, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.serviceDescriptionText: Adopte un Étudiant is an online platform that facilitates connections between students seeking internships or work-study programs and companies offering professional opportunities.
terms.registrationText: To use our services, you must:
registrationList: Maintain the confidentiality of your credentials
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
acceptableUseList: Publish illegal, offensive or inappropriate content
Use the platform for unauthorized commercial purposes
Attempt to access other users' accounts
terms.userContentText: You retain ownership of your content, but you grant us a license to use it in the context of our services. You are responsible for the accuracy and legality of your content.
terms.liabilityText: Adopte un Étudiant acts as an intermediary. We are not responsible for relationships between users, the quality of offers or applications, or hiring decisions.
terms.suspensionText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these terms of service or for any other legitimate reason.
terms.modificationsText: We may modify these terms of service at any time. Important modifications will be notified to you by email or via the platform.
terms.applicableLawText: These terms of service are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Paris.
terms.contactText: For any questions regarding these terms of service, contact us at:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.whatIsCookieText: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies allow us to recognize your browser and remember certain information about your preferences or past actions.
cookies.essentialCookiesText: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the site. They enable navigation, authentication and access to secure areas.
cookies.performanceCookiesText: These cookies collect anonymous information about how you use our site, helping us improve its performance and your experience.
cookies.functionalCookiesText: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices (language, region) and provide enhanced and personalized features.
cookies.advertisingCookiesText: These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements and limit the number of times an advertisement is shown to you.
cookies.thirdPartyCookiesText: We also use third-party services that may place cookies on your device:
cookies.cookieManagementText: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
cookies.browserSettingsText: Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies, delete existing cookies and set preferences for certain sites.
cookies.disableToolsText: You can use tools like Google Analytics Opt-out to specifically disable certain tracking cookies.
cookies.disableImpactText: Warning: Disabling certain cookies may affect the site's functionality and limit your user experience. Some features may no longer be available.
cookies.retentionPeriodText: The retention period of cookies varies according to their type:
cookies.sessionCookiesText: Deleted when the browser is closed
cookies.persistentCookiesText: Retained until their expiration date or manual deletion
cookies.modificationsText: We may update this cookie policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.
cookies.contactText: For any questions regarding our use of cookies, contact us at:

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.subtitle: Legal and regulatory information about the Adopte un Étudiant website

editor.title: 1. Publisher of the website
editor.address: Registered office: 123 Avenue des Champs-Élysées, 75008 Paris, France

hosting.title: 3. Hosting
hosting.cdnAddress: 101 Townsend St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual property
intellectualProperty.p1: All content on this website (texts, images, videos, logos, graphics, icons, sounds, software, etc.) is protected by copyright, trademark law and/or any other intellectual property rights.
intellectualProperty.p2: These elements are the exclusive property of Adopte un Étudiant or are used with permission. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited without prior written authorization.
intellectualProperty.p3: Any unauthorized use of the site or any of the elements it contains will be considered as constituting an infringement and prosecuted in accordance with the provisions of Articles L.335-2 et seq. of the French Intellectual Property Code.

dataProtection.title: 5. Personal data protection
dataProtection.p1: In accordance with the French Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978 as amended and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of April 27, 2016, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, object, restrict processing and portability of your data.
dataProtection.p2: To exercise these rights or for any questions about the processing of your data, you can contact us:
dataProtection.contactMail: By post: Adopte un Étudiant - DPO, 123 Avenue des Champs-Élysées, 75008 Paris
dataProtection.cnilPrompt: You can also lodge a complaint with the French Data Protection Authority (CNIL):

legalNotice.additionalInfoText: This legal notice was updated on January 1, 2024. It may be changed at any time to comply with legal and regulatory developments.

gdpr.title: General Data Protection Regulation
gdpr.description: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and personal data
gdpr.introText: Adopte un Étudiant is committed to protecting the privacy of its users in accordance with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), in force since May 25, 2018.
gdpr.dataCollectedSubtitle: We collect only the data necessary for our services

purposesList: Creation and management of your user account

rights.title: Your GDPR rights
rights.accessDescription: You can request access to the personal data we hold about you.
rights.rectificationDescription: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
rights.erasureDescription: You can request deletion of your data in certain circumstances.
rights.portabilityDescription: You can obtain your data in a structured and readable format.

contact.title: Exercise your rights
contact.description: To exercise your rights or for any questions about the processing of your personal data, contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO).
